Title: The Crew
Writer: Julien Leclercq (dialogue), Julien Leclercq (screenplay), Simon Moutairou (dialogue), Simon Moutairou (screenplay)
Actors: Sami Bouajila, Guillaume Gouix, Youssef Hajdi, Redouane Behache
Plot: Work-life balance breaks down for Paris's most gifted armed robbers when a grave mistake forces them to work for a crime boss in a high-stakes heist.
